Class clientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • clientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class clientThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    One clientThread for one device. Adds and sends balls the balls.
